# Soil Temp Meta Data {#soiltemp}

The easiest data to work with for vegetation and forest structure metrics was compiled and submitted to the soil temp database. This set of files includes a word document that details the set-up of the meta-data file. 

Here is a list of the files in submitted to this database: 

```{r}
soil_temp <- list.files(paste0(getwd(), "/_SoilTemp"))

```
